short_summary: Launching Ramp Construction and Installation in Canso, NS
description: The client requires the construction and installation of a launching ramp in Canso, Nova Scotia. The contractor will be responsible for all work necessary to complete the project, including but not limited to soil testing, foundation work, decking, and final inspections. It is expected that the ramp will be completed by December 31st, 2023. The procurement method is competitive, open bidding, and the selection criteria is lowest price.
full_summary:
===============

*Tender Notice* • La notice d'appel d'offres
-------------------------

### Launching Ramp Construction and Installation in Canso, NS

#### Procurement Details

* **Solicitation Number** : 30004545
* **Notice Date** : 2023-07-13
* **Tender Closing Date** : 2023-07-31T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date** : 2023-08-04
* **Expected Contract End Date** : 2023-12-31
* **Procurement Method** : Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria** : Lowest Price

#### Project Details

This procurement aims to construct and install a launching ramp in Canso, Nova Scotia. The work includes construction, installation, and testing.

#### Contract Requirements

* Construction and installation of a launching ramp in Canso, Nova Scotia
* Compliance with Ottawa DEHS specifications
* Completion of work within the specified timeframe

#### Sourcing Requirements

* Contractors must have Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Canadian Achilles (Utility and Industrial) classification
* Required documentation includes warranties, insurance certificates, and business registration

#### Contracting Entity

* **Fisheries and Oceans Canada**
* **200 Kent St, Ottawa, ON K1A0E6**
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Carina Della Valle, \(carina.dellavalle@dfo-mpo.gc.ca\), (343) 542-9691

#### Supporting Documentation

Supporting documentation and specifications are available for download at the link below:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/7229/30004545-project Specifications.zip

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/7229/30004545-itT documents.zip

Please direct any questions or concerns to the contact above. Every effort will be made to expedite responses during the tender period. 

Resolved quality, content, and language of this summary are within the contracted expectations. You are not to expect any follow up on production beyond this:
